Lord Solar Leontus.name: Lord Solar Leontus

unit.name: The Lord Solar
unit.description: At the start of your Command phase , if this model is on the battlefield, you gain 1CP. The Collegiate Astrolex: After both players have deployed their armies, select up to three ASTRA MILITARUM units from your army and redeploy them. When doing so, you can set those units up in Strategic Reserves if you wish, regardless of how many units are already in Strategic Reserves.

unit.name: This OFFICER can issue up to 3 Orders to
unit.description: REGIMENT units SQUADRON units TITANIC units

Lord Solar Leontus.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Attilan Rough Riders Cadian Shock Troops Catachan Jungle Fighters Death Riders Kasrkin Krieg Combat Engineers Death Korps Of Krieg
led_by: Attilan Rough Riders Cadian Shock Troops Catachan Jungle Fighters Death Riders Kasrkin Krieg Combat Engineers Death Korps Of Krieg
can_lead: the following units: Attilan Rough Riders Cadian Shock Troops Catachan Jungle Fighters Death Riders Kasrkin Krieg Combat Engineers Death Korps Of Krieg
default_wargear: 1 Lord Solar Leontus – EPIC HERO This model is equipped with: Sol’s Righteous Gaze; Conquest; Konstantin’s hooves.

Cadian Castellan.name: Cadian Castellan

unit.name: Senior Officer
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. Get Back in the Fight: While this model is leading a unit, that unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back .

Cadian Castellan.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Cadian Shock Troops Kasrkin
can_lead: the following units: Cadian Shock Troops Kasrkin
default_wargear: 1 Cadian Castellan This model is equipped with: laspistol; chainsword.

Cadian Command Squad.name: Cadian Command Squad

ranged.name: Plasma gun – supercharge hazardous rapid fire 1

unit.name: Cadia Stands!
unit.description: While this unit contains an OFFICER , each time a ranged attack targets this unit, if this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, models in this unit have the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

unit.name: Master Vox
unit.description: Each time the OFFICER in the bearer’s unit issues an Order , it can issue it to an eligible unit up to 24" away.

unit.name: Medi-pack
unit.description: At the start of your Command phase , if the bearer’s unit is below its Starting Strength , you can return up to D3 destroyed PLATOON models (excluding CHARACTERS ) to this unit.

unit.name: Regimental Standard
unit.description: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit.

Cadian Command Squad.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following unit: Cadian Shock Troops
can_lead: the following unit: Cadian Shock Troops
default_wargear: 1 Cadian Commander 4 Cadian Veteran Guardsmen The Cadian Commander is equipped with: laspistol; chainsword. 1 Cadian Veteran Guardsman is equipped with: las pistol; chainsword. 1 other Cadian Veteran Guardsman is equipped with: lasgun; master vox; close combat weapon. 1 other Cadian Veteran Guardsman is equipped with: lasgun; medi-pack; close combat weapon. 1 other Cadian Veteran Guardsman is equipped with: lasgun; regimental standard; close combat weapon.

Commissar.name: Commissar

unit.name: Summary Execution
unit.description: Once per battle round , at the start of any phase, you can select one friendly ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY unit that is Battle-shocked and within 12" of this model. If you do, one model in that unit is destroyed, and that unit is then no longer Battle-shocked. Political Overwatch: While another OFFICER model is in the same unit as this model, you can re-roll Battle-shock test s taken for that unit.

Commissar.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Cadian Shock Troops Catachan Jungle Fighters Kasrkin Krieg Combat Engineers Tempestus Scions Death Korps Of Krieg
led_by: Cadian Shock Troops Catachan Jungle Fighters Kasrkin Krieg Combat Engineers Tempestus Scions Death Korps Of Krieg
can_lead: the following units: Cadian Shock Troops Catachan Jungle Fighters Kasrkin Krieg Combat Engineers Tempestus Scions Death Korps Of Krieg
default_wargear: 1 Commissar This model is equipped with: bolt pistol; chainsword.

Catachan Jungle Fighters.name: Catachan Jungle Fighters

unit.name: Jungle Fighters
unit.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack, if this unit made a Charge move or was charged this turn, add 1 to the Wound roll .

unit.name: Vox-caster
unit.description: Each time you target the bearer’s unit with a Stratagem , roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if there are one or more friendly OFFICER models within 6": on a 5+, you gain 1CP.

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units
unit.description: Catachan Command Squad Commissar Lord Solar Leontus Ministorum Priest Primaris Psyker Tech-Priest Enginseer Inquisitor Inquisitor Coteaz Inquisitor Draxus Inquisitor Greyfax ‘Iron Hand’ Straken Inquisitor Eisenhorn Inquisitor In Terminator Armour Inquisitor Ostromandeus Sergeant Harker

default_wargear: 1 Jungle Fighter Sergeant and 9 Jungle Fighters OR 2 Jungle Fighter Sergeants and 18 Jungle Fighters Every Jungle Fighter Sergeant is equipped with: laspistol; close combat weapon. Every Jungle Fighter is equipped with: lasgun; close combat weapon. This unit can have up to two Leader units attached to it, provided no more than one of those units is a COMMAND SQUAD unit. If it does, and this Bodyguard unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units, with their original Starting Strengths .

Cadian Shock Troops.name: Cadian Shock Troops

ranged.name: Plasma gun – supercharge hazardous rapid fire 1

unit.name: Shock Troops
unit.description: At the end of your Command phase , if this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, that objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

unit.name: Vox-caster
unit.description: Each time you target the bearer’s unit with a Stratagem , roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if there are one or more friendly OFFICER models within 6": on a 5+, you gain 1CP.

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units
unit.description: Cadian Castellan Cadian Command Squad Commissar Lord Solar Leontus Ministorum Priest Primaris Psyker Tech-Priest Enginseer Ursula Creed Inquisitor Inquisitor Coteaz Inquisitor Draxus Inquisitor Greyfax Hell’s Last Inquisitor Eisenhorn Inquisitor In Terminator Armour Inquisitor Ostromandeus

default_wargear: 1 Shock Trooper Sergeant and 9 Shock Troopers OR 2 Shock Trooper Sergeants and 18 Shock Troopers Every Shock Trooper Sergeant is equipped with: laspistol; chainsword. Every Shock Trooper is equipped with: lasgun; close combat weapon. This unit can have up to two Leader units attached to it, provided no more than one of those units is a COMMAND SQUAD unit. If it does, and this Bodyguard unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units, with their original Starting Strengths .

Kasrkin.name: Kasrkin

ranged.name: Plasma gun – supercharge hazardous rapid fire 1

unit.name: Warrior Elite
unit.description: Once per battle round , at the start of any phase, you can select one Order to affect this unit until the start of your next Command phase , in addition to any other Orders issued to this unit by an OFFICER model this battle round.

unit.name: Vox-caster
unit.description: Each time you target the bearer’s unit with a Stratagem , roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if there are one or more friendly OFFICER models within 6": on a 5+, you gain 1CP.

unit.name: Melta Mine
unit.description: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, you can select one enemy unit within 3" of the bearer and roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds , or 2D3 mortal wounds instead if it is a VEHICLE unit.

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units
unit.description: Cadian Castellan Commissar Lord Solar Leontus Ministorum Priest Primaris Psyker Tech-Priest Enginseer Ursula Creed

default_wargear: 1 Kasrkin Sergeant 9 Kasrkin Troopers The Kasrkin Sergeant is equipped with: hot-shot laspistol; chainsword. Every Kasrkin Trooper is equipped with: hot-shot lasgun; close combat weapon.

Tempestus Scions.name: Tempestus Scions

ranged.name: Plasma gun – supercharge hazardous rapid fire 1

unit.name: Storm Troopers
unit.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If the target of that attack is an enemy unit within range of an objective marker , you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

unit.name: Vox-caster
unit.description: Each time you target the bearer’s unit with a Stratagem , roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if there are one or more friendly OFFICER models within 6": on a 5+, you gain 1CP.

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units
unit.description: Commissar Militarum Tempestus Command Squad Ministorum Priest Primaris Psyker

default_wargear: 1 Tempestor 4-9 Tempestus Scions The Tempestor is equipped with: hot-shot laspistol; chainsword. Every Tempestus Scion is equipped with: hot-shot lasgun; close combat weapon. This unit can have up to two Leader units attached to it, provided no more than one of those units is a COMMAND SQUAD unit. If it does, and this Bodyguard unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units, with their original Starting Strengths .

Leman Russ Battle Tank.name: Leman Russ Battle Tank

unit.name: One Shot
unit.description: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.

unit.name: Armoured Spearhead
unit.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets an enemy unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and, if that unit is within range of an objective marker you do not control, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

default_wargear: 1 Leman Russ Battle Tank This model is equipped with: lascannon; Leman Russ battle cannon; armoured tracks.

Rogal Dorn Battle Tank.name: Rogal Dorn Battle Tank

unit.name: Ablative Plating
unit.description: Once per battle, when an attack is allocated to this model, you change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0.

default_wargear: 1 Rogal Dorn Battle Tank This model is equipped with: castigator gatling cannon; heavy stubber; twin battle cannon; armoured tracks.

Baneblade.name: Baneblade

ranged.name: Twin heavy bolter sustained hits 1 twin-linked
Twin heavy flamer ignores cover torrent twin-linked

unit.name: Rolling Fortress
unit.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to an ASTRA MILITARUM model from your army, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this BANEBLADE model, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

default_wargear: 1 Baneblade This model is equipped with: Baneblade cannon; coaxial autocannon; demolisher cannon; heavy stubber; 2 lascannons; twin heavy bolter; 2 twin heavy flamers; armoured tracks.

Basilisk.name: Basilisk

unit.name: One Shot
unit.description: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.

unit.name: Earthshaker Rounds
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, if one or more of those attacks made with its earthshaker cannon scored a hit against an enemy INFANTRY unit, until the start of your next Shooting phase, that unit is shaken. While a unit is shaken, subtract 2" from its Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for it.

default_wargear: 1 Basilisk This model is equipped with: earthshaker cannon; heavy bolter; armoured tracks.

Manticore.name: Manticore

unit.name: One Shot
unit.description: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.

unit.name: Furious Barrage
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, select one enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES ) that was hit by one or more of those attacks made with this model’s storm eagle rockets. Until the start of your next Shooting phase, that enemy unit is staggered. While a unit is staggered, subtract 1 from the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit (to a minimum of 1).

default_wargear: 1 Manticore This model is equipped with: heavy bolter; storm eagle rockets; armoured tracks.

Chimera.name: Chimera

unit.name: One Shot
unit.description: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.

unit.name: Mobile Command Vehicle
unit.description: In your Command phase , one OFFICER model embarked within this TRANSPORT can issue Orders even though it is not on the battlefield. When doing so, measure distances to and from this TRANSPORT .

default_wargear: 1 Chimera This model is equipped with: multi-laser; heavy bolter; lasgun array; armoured tracks.
Chimera.transport_capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 12 ASTRA MILITARUM INFANTRY models. Each OGRYN model takes up the space of 3 models. It cannot transport ARTILLERY models.

Armoured Sentinels.name: Armoured Sentinels

unit.name: One Shot
unit.description: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.

unit.name: Mobile Hunter-killers
unit.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll .

default_wargear: 1-2 Armoured Sentinels Every model is equipped with: multi-laser; close combat weapon.

Scout Sentinels.name: Scout Sentinels

unit.name: One Shot
unit.description: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.

unit.name: Daring Recon
unit.description: At the start of your Shooting phase , select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to this unit. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly ASTRA MILITARUM model makes an attack that targets that unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

unit.name: 1-2 Scout Sentinels Every model is equipped with
unit.description: multi-laser; close combat weapon.

default_wargear: 1-2 Scout Sentinels Every model is equipped with: multi-laser; close combat weapon.

Ogryn Bodyguard.name: Ogryn Bodyguard

unit.name: Ogryn Bodyguard
unit.description: While one or more OFFICER models are in the same unit as this model, those OFFICER models have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

unit.name: Brute Shield
unit.description: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save .

unit.name: Slabshield
unit.description: The bearer has a Wounds characteristic of 7.

default_wargear: 1 Ogryn Bodyguard This model is equipped with: ripper gun; close combat weapon; huge knife.
